document_data.mainbody:
Antone Corluk was a footman under the command of Oriphaun Huntsilver of House Huntsilver from the town of Eveningstar in Cormyr in the late 15 century DR.
Antone was a human soldier with stern demeanor and chestnut hair.
In the late 15 century DR, Antone Corluk asked a band of adventurers from the world of Eberron, who were transported to Toril by a rift, to lend a hand to his master, nobleman adventurer and relic collector Oriphaun Huntsilver, who found himself at the heart of a plot to attack the city of Wheloon by the shadow forces of the Returned Netheril.
